example.name: hitchhike-v
example.text: Suddenly, it dawned on me that I'd once hitchhiked along those same roads.

example.name: hitchhiking-n
example.text: This can be important when one allele in a particular haplotype is strongly beneficial : natural selection can drive a selective sweep that will also cause the other alleles in the haplotype to become more common in the population ; this effect is called genetic hitchhiking or genetic draft .
